title: Hacked Account
body:
Dear Riot

My account has recently been hacked into and he has been using my account since 29/06/2015. He has changed the email address in my account so I cannot change my password. I have postd his email address below.

He has also subsequently messaged me from his other hacked account. Here is some of the conservation he started:

[8:59] lihuanjie: Redeye09:redeye09
I'm your so called hacker
[9:00] lihuanjie: combatarmsvslol@gmail.com
[9:01] lihuanjie: 
You keep talking shit to
the other guy
that I hacked
"Hey Kid Wanna SS"
[9:03] lihuanjie: "meh"
Go back to school where you belong
and realise the real world reporting does nothing.
[9:03] lihuanjie: You sure seem to be acting like you haev any leverage
you've got nothing
little fucking bitch boy.
[9:07] lihuanjie: LOL?
it took my cracker 4 hous
to get your account
you clearly have NO idea how hacking actually works


So Riot Staff. I have submit a ticket to you guys under the subject line "Unrecoverable Account".

Please assist and investigate this matter further as soon as you can.

replies.body: You're the idiot for using your username as your password, I've seen many accounts hacked because of idiots that do that. So in my opinion I hope that you've learnt your lesson. Next time dont have the same username and password.
You see that button on the top of the page labelled "support"? It's not just for show. Use it.
If you verified your email it wouldn't happen.
